intro: Zyrphelis macrocarpa, commonly known as the large-fruited zyrphelis, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. The plant produces large, fleshy fruits that contain numerous seeds, which are dispersed by animals. Zyrphelis macrocarpa thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. Its botanical features make it an important component of the ecosystems where it is native.
